channel.title: TPPI Server - Whitelisted
channel.description:
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,661733.msg4443863.html#msg4443863]World download[/url]
[s]I'm hosting the TPPI modpack(version 1.0.4) for everyone to play on temporarily(hopefully we can move to mitb's server soon).
To play you will need a legitimate minecraft account (online mode enabled) and the FTB launcher http://www.feed-the-beast.com/ . In the launcher under mod packs click pack codes and put in MegaSharkPunch to get the TPPI mod pack.
You also need to post here https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,275.0.html to request whitelist access. I believe everyone who has shown interest in the topic has already been added so try to join first before applying.
Server Ip/host 24.88.86.54 or zuppers.ddns.net or zuppers.serveminecraft.net [/s] Server specs: [spoiler][s]2 x Intel Xeon 5130 (2 cores each @2Ghz)[/s] 2 x Intel Xeon L5335 (4 cores each @2Ghz) [s]4GB ram[/s] 16GB (8GB ramdisk, 4GB given to the server(jvm), 4GB left over for the os) 2 x psu 600watts 2 x hdd in raid 1 configuration
OS: [s]Windows Server 2003 32bit[/s] Ubuntu Server 14.04 64bit
Network specs 2 x NIC in load balancing configuration [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3483336800.png[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: TPPI Server - Whitelisted
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:33, topic:542858”][quote author=Fuscate link=topic=661733.msg4439294#msg4439294 date=1406021369]

Ok, so I got the mod pack download and everything and clicked launch… now it tries to open a minecraft client, then it closes then the CMD spams a shit load and everything closes. Any idea? lol…

Paste the log to pastebin and i’ll take a look. Did you install any other mods before launching? Are you running the latest version of the pack? Are you running Java 7 or 8?
[/quote]

Its running off Java 8, no mods installed, it closes too fast for me to get the shit it prints… LOL[/quote]
Forge creates a logfile in your installation directory for the pack. Check there

Read full topic
